HOME.title: Home
HOME.name: Zach
HOME.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in web development with Japanese language skills.

ABOUT.title: Learn About Me
ABOUT.full_about: I'm a self-taught software engineer specializing in web development. I have extensive experience working with modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries like React, Next JS, Svelte, etc.  I also am comfortable with various CSS solutions such as Styled Components and Tailwind.

blurb1.title: Core Values
blurb1.text: I prioritize kind and clear communication and always aim to enhance the quality of whatever project I work on. Being a self-taught programmer and Japanese speaker, I have a strong work ethic and enjoy working on tasks to completion.

interac.name: Assistant Language Teacher
interac.description: As an ALT (Assistant Language Teacher) at Interac, I taught English to Japanese students in public schools.

rapptr.name: Frontend Engineer
rapptr.quote: From app strategy, design and development to launch and ongoing tailored support, we are with you every step of the way – continuously refining and evolving your product.
rapptr.description:
Main Tasks:

- Managed bug tickets, support tasks, and new feature development.

- Collaborated with clients on BRDs, feature briefs, tech specs, and documentation.

- Coordinated with design, engineering, and product teams.

- Conducted first-round interviews and reviewed candidates' applications.

Notable Accomplishments On Main Project

- Implemented a reusable project component library update based on a Figma file.

- Developed an embeddable widget involving extensive research and coordination with various companies' engineering teams.

- Enhanced QA processes, including improved instructions, weekly code reviews, and a dedicated testing environment.

- Significantly refactored the codebase, reducing tech debt. While not the goal, it removed over 50,000 lines of code.

sellfire.name: Frontend Engineer
sellfire.quote: Sellfire is an all-in-one sales platform for inside sales teams. It offers all the necessary features in one software, including dial functions, real-time reporting, coaching and development, pipeline management, and automated lead management. Sellfire supports team scaling while improving sales performance. With real-time call coaching and report display, it quickly identifies and improves sales opportunities. By using Sellfire, sales teams can operate efficiently and effectively, accelerating business growth.
sellfire.description: Worked part-time as a front-end engineer for Sellfire while attending a Japanese language school in Japan.

fe.description: I have extensive experience using a variety of frontend frameworks and tools to create responsive and accessible web applications. My work includes managing bug tickets, support tasks, and new feature development. I am proficient with CSS and CSS-in-JS tools like Styled Components and Tailwind. Crafting strong, reusable components is an art I continually strive to perfect. I am comfortable working in large code bases and understand the importance of refactoring code to reduce technical debt.
fe.name: Frontend Web

be.description: I have experience working with REST and GraphQL APIs on Node JS backends in Typescript. I also have experience working with databases in both SQL and NoSQL formats. At Rapptr Labs I worked on backend tickets for a business-level application using Node.js and Express with a database in SQL, interacted with through Prisma. In addition I am comfortable writing unit tests with Jest.
be.name: Backend Web

cyber-security.description: My fascination with cybersecurity sparked when I implemented a comprehensive site overhaul according to a third-party audit at work. This experience exposed me to numerous cybersecurity concepts. While I am not pursuing a career in cybersecurity, I hope to continue to learn and apply these concepts in my work.
cyber-security.name: Cybersecurity

dev-tools.description: Whether it is fixing merge conflicts in Git, or updating tickets in Jira, I am comfortable using a variety of tools to get the job done.
dev-tools.name: Dev Tools

japanese.description: Outside of coding this is my biggest passion. I hope to one day be fluent and spend some time every day studying.
japanese.name: Japanese

mobile.description: I am currently studying mobile development using React Native and use it on an active side project. I hope to increase my skills in this area and eventually work on a web/mobile cross development team.
mobile.name: Mobile Development

SEARCH.title: Search
SEARCH.prompt: Try typing a skill, name, or tool.

MY_ANIME_COLLECTION.description: My Anime Collection is a free anime tracker where you can explore and create custom playlists of your favorite anime.

ZACH_STONE.description: My blog. Read about coding concepts, Japan, and all things related to being a web developer.
ZACH_STONE.shortDescription: My blog. Read about coding concepts, Japan, and all things related to being a web developer.

AI_FLASHCARDS.name: Infinite Flashcards
AI_FLASHCARDS.description:
This project is a Python script that generates Anki flashcards from a word list using OpenAI. 
 The generated cards include word readings, example sentences, and basic definitions. 
 This Python script significantly simplifies the process of creating new cards, allowing learners to focus on studying rather than card creation.
AI_FLASHCARDS.shortDescription: Generate Anki flashcards from a word list or essay using OpenAI.

RIFFS.name: Riffs!
RIFFS.description: A place to share your new songs, covers, and musical ideas with the world.
RIFFS.shortDescription: A place to share your new songs, covers, and musical ideas with the world.

JAPANESE_QUIZ.name: Prefecture Quiz
JAPANESE_QUIZ.description: Test your knowledge of Japanese prefectures with this fun quiz.
JAPANESE_QUIZ.shortDescription: Test your knowledge of Japanese prefectures with this fun quiz.

IMMERSE_IN_JAPAN.name: Immerse In Japan
IMMERSE_IN_JAPAN.description: A website to help Japanese learners find new language-learning tools and content tailored to their skill level.
IMMERSE_IN_JAPAN.shortDescription: A website to help Japanese learners find new language-learning tools and content tailored to their skill level.
